verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu sukhe bhojane vasilā
vyañjanera svāda pāñā kahite lāgilā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sukhe—in happiness; bhojane vasilā—sat to take His food; vyañjanera svāda—the taste of the vegetables; pāñā—getting; kahite lāgilā—began to say.
translation: In great happiness, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then accepted the lunch. When He had tasted the vegetables, He again began to speak.
